column5: Nice day on the river, alot of hard fighting acrobatic fish in the 1-5 lb range landed and quite a few succumbing to the logs and straightened out fly hooks in the 10lb + range.  Even had a double header going at one point, but only one landed from it.  See if my fishing buddy who stole the show will post his pics as well, Lol.
Nice fish Stonefly, looks like some pretty clear water you're fishing.
I think the Rainbows are such great looking fish to see in pics.Always a joy to see thse fish in a report.  MTP

very nice fish!  my soon to be father-in-law wanted to learn how to fly fish so we have been out a couple times this spring experimenting. it's so hard not to just grab my float rod though.  if you are ever fishing in the east end tribs i would love to come out and meet up with you to pick up a few pointers
Great report and pics Stonefly Beautiful bows!!!  Congratulations  Thanks for sharing Leechman
